verses.verse: הַדָּבָר֙ <WH1697> The word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> that הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> came אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <WH3414> that came to Jeremiah אֶ֚ל <WH413> about כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיְּהוּדִ֔ים <WH3064> concerning all the Jews הַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <WH3427> which dwell בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt הַיֹּשְׁבִ֤ים <WH3427> which dwell בְּמִגְדֹּל֙ <WH4024> at Migdol וּבְתַחְפַּנְחֵ֣ס <WH8471> and at Tahpanhes וּבְנֹ֔ף <WH5297> and at Noph וּבְאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> and in the country פַּתְר֖וֹס <WH6624> of Pathros לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying ס

כֹּה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you רְאִיתֶ֗ם <WH7200> Ye have seen אֵ֤ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָֽרָעָה֙ <WH7451> all the evil אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> i הֵבֵ֙אתִי֙ <WH935> that I have brought עַל־ <WH5921> on יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> upon Jerusalem וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> and all עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> and upon all the cities יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וְהִנָּ֤ם <WH2005> are in חָרְבָּה֙ <WH2723> they [are] a desolation הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> and behold this day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and no בָּהֶ֖ם יוֹשֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> and no man dwelleth

מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> Because רָעָתָ֗ם <WH7451> of their wickedness אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which עָשׂוּ֙ <WH6213> which they have committed לְהַכְעִסֵ֔נִי <WH3707> to provoke me to anger לָלֶ֣כֶת <WH1980> continuing לְקַטֵּ֔ר <WH6999> to burn incense לַעֲבֹ֖ד <WH5647> [and] to serve לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֑ים <WH312> other אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> whom לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יְדָע֔וּם <WH3045> whom they knew הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> like אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> you וַאֲבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1> not [neither] they ye nor your fathers

וָאֶשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> Howbeit I sent אֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲבָדַ֣י <WH5650> unto you all my servants הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <WH5030> the prophets הַשְׁכֵּ֥ים <WH7925> rising early וְשָׁלֹ֖חַ <WH7971> and sending לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> [them] saying אַל־ <WH408> nay נָ֣א <WH4994> Oh תַעֲשׂ֗וּ <WH6213> Oh do אֵ֛ת <WH853> דְּבַֽר־ <WH1697> thing הַתֹּעֵבָ֥ה <WH8441> not this abominable הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> likewise אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which שָׂנֵֽאתִי׃ <WH8130> that I hate

וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> did not שָֽׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> But they hearkened וְלֹא־ <WH3808> or הִטּ֣וּ <WH5186> not nor inclined אֶת־ <WH853> אָזְנָ֔ם <WH241> their ear לָשׁ֖וּב <WH7725> to turn מֵרָֽעָתָ֑ם <WH7451> from their wickedness לְבִלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> not קַטֵּ֖ר <WH6999> to burn no incense לֵאלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִֽים׃ <WH312> unto other

וַתִּתַּ֤ךְ <WH5413> was poured forth חֲמָתִי֙ <WH2534> Wherefore my fury וְאַפִּ֔י <WH639> and mine anger וַתִּבְעַר֙ <WH1197> and was kindled בְּעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> in the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וּבְחֻצ֖וֹת <WH2351> and in the streets יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וַתִּהְיֶ֛ינָה <WH1961> have לְחָרְבָּ֥ה <WH2723> and they are wasted לִשְׁמָמָ֖ה <WH8077> [and] desolate כַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> as at this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> is this ס

וְעַתָּ֡ה <WH6258> Now כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Therefore now thus saith יְהוָה֩ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֨י <WH430> the God צְבָא֜וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel לָמָה֩ <WH4100> Why אַתֶּ֨ם <WH859> are you עֹשִׂ֜ים <WH6213> Wherefore commit רָעָ֤ה <WH7451> evil גְדוֹלָה֙ <WH1419> ye [this] great אֶל־ <WH413> to נַפְשֹׁ֣תֵכֶ֔ם <WH5315> against your souls לְהַכְרִ֨ית <WH3772> to cut off לָכֶ֧ם אִישׁ־ <WH376> from you man וְאִשָּׁ֛ה <WH802> and woman עוֹלֵ֥ל <WH5768> child וְיוֹנֵ֖ק <WH3243> and suckling מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> out יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah לְבִלְתִּ֛י <WH1115> without הוֹתִ֥יר <WH3498> to leave לָכֶ֖ם שְׁאֵרִֽית׃ <WH7611> you none to remain

לְהַכְעִסֵ֙נִי֙ <WH3707> In that ye provoke me unto wrath בְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣י <WH4639> with the works יְדֵיכֶ֔ם <WH3027> of your hands לְקַטֵּ֞ר <WH6999> burning incense לֵאלֹהִ֤ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִים֙ <WH312> unto other בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> you בָּאִ֖ים <WH935> whither ye be gone לָג֣וּר <WH1481> to dwell שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> in it לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> so הַכְרִ֣ית <WH3772> that ye might cut yourselves off לָכֶ֔ם וּלְמַ֤עַן <WH4616> so הֱיֽוֹתְכֶם֙ <WH1961> and become לִקְלָלָ֣ה <WH7045> and that ye might be a curse וּלְחֶרְפָּ֔ה <WH2781> and a reproach בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all גּוֹיֵ֥י <WH1471> among all the nations הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the land

הַֽשְׁכַחְתֶּם֩ <WH7911> Have ye forgotten אֶת־ <WH853> רָע֨וֹת <WH7451> the wickedness אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֜ם <WH1> of your fathers וְאֶת־ <WH853> רָע֣וֹת ׀ <WH7451> and the wickedness מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> of the kings יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah וְאֵת֙ <WH853> רָע֣וֹת <WH7451> and the wickedness נָשָׁ֔יו <WH802> of their wives וְאֵת֙ <WH853> רָעֹ֣תֵכֶ֔ם <WH7451> and your own wickedness וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> רָעֹ֣ת <WH7451> and the wickedness נְשֵׁיכֶ֑ם <WH802> of your wives אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which עָשׂוּ֙ <WH6213> which they have committed בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וּבְחֻצ֖וֹת <WH2351> and in the streets יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> Jerusalem

לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor דֻכְּא֔וּ <WH1792> They are not humbled עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> [even] unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> to this וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יָרְא֗וּ <WH3372> neither have they feared וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor הָלְכ֤וּ <WH1980> nor walked בְתֽוֹרָתִי֙ <WH8451> in my law וּבְחֻקֹּתַ֔י <WH2708> nor in my statutes אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> that I set לִפְנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH6440> before וְלִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> you and before אֲבוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1> your fathers ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> I am going שָׂ֥ם <WH7760> Behold I will set פָּנַ֛י <WH6440> my face בָּכֶ֖ם לְרָעָ֑ה <WH7451> against you for evil וּלְהַכְרִ֖ית <WH3772> and to cut off אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> all Judah

וְלָקַחְתִּ֞י <WH3947> And I will take אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> the remnant יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who שָׂ֨מוּ <WH7760> that have set פְנֵיהֶ֜ם <WH6440> their faces לָב֣וֹא <WH935> to go אֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> into the land מִצְרַיִם֮ <WH4714> of Egypt לָג֣וּר <WH1481> to sojourn שָׁם֒ <WH8033> there וְתַ֨מּוּ <WH8552> there and they shall all be consumed כֹ֜ל <WH3605> will all בְּאֶ֧רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרַ֣יִם <WH4714> of Egypt יִפֹּ֗לוּ <WH5307> [and] fall בַּחֶ֤רֶב <WH2719> by the sword בָּֽרָעָב֙ <WH7458> [and] by the famine יִתַּ֔מּוּ <WH8552> they shall [even] be consumed מִקָּטֹן֙ <WH6996> from the least וְעַד־ <WH5704> against גָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> even unto the greatest בַּחֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> by the sword וּבָרָעָ֖ב <WH7458> and by the famine יָמֻ֑תוּ <WH4191> they shall die וְהָיוּ֙ <WH1961> will become לְאָלָ֣ה <WH423> and they shall be an execration לְשַׁמָּ֔ה <WH8047> [and] an astonishment וְלִקְלָלָ֖ה <WH7045> and a curse וּלְחֶרְפָּֽה׃ <WH2781> and a reproach

וּפָקַדְתִּ֗י <WH6485> For I will punish עַ֤ל <WH5921> and הַיּֽוֹשְׁבִים֙ <WH3427> them that dwell בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> I פָּקַ֖דְתִּי <WH6485> as I have punished עַל־ <WH5921> and יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> Jerusalem בַּחֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> by the sword בָּרָעָ֖ב <WH7458> by the famine וּבַדָּֽבֶר׃ <WH1698> and by the pestilence

וְלֹ֨א <WH3808> will be no יִהְיֶ֜ה <WH1961> become פָּלִ֤יט <WH6412> there shall escape וְשָׂרִיד֙ <WH8300> or remain לִשְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> So that none of the remnant יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah הַבָּאִ֥ים <WH935> which are gone לָגֽוּר־ <WH1481> to sojourn שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> into the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְלָשׁ֣וּב ׀ <WH7725> that they should return אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> into the land יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> to which הֵ֜מָּה <WH1992> they מְנַשְּׂאִ֤ים <WH5375> to the which they have אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשָׁם֙ <WH5315> a desire לָשׁוּב֙ <WH7725> to return לָשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> to dwell שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> there כִּ֥י <WH3588> for לֹֽא־ <WH3808> none יָשׁ֖וּבוּ <WH7725> there for none shall return כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo פְּלֵטִֽים׃ <WH6412> refugees ס

וַיַּעֲנ֣וּ <WH6030> answered אֶֽת־ <WH853> יִרְמְיָ֗הוּ <WH3414> Jeremiah כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאֲנָשִׁ֤ים <WH376> the men הַיֹּֽדְעִים֙ <WH3045> which knew כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מְקַטְּר֤וֹת <WH6999> had burned incense נְשֵׁיהֶם֙ <WH802> that their wives לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> unto other וְכָל־ <WH3605> all הַנָּשִׁ֥ים <WH802> and all the women הָעֹמְד֖וֹת <WH5975> that stood by קָהָ֣ל <WH6951> multitude גָּד֑וֹל <WH1419> a great וְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> even all the people הַיֹּשְׁבִ֥ים <WH3427> that dwelt בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> in the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt בְּפַתְר֥וֹס <WH6624> in Pathros לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

הַדָּבָ֛ר <WH1697> [As for] the word אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> you דִּבַּ֥רְתָּ <WH1696> that thou hast spoken אֵלֵ֖ינוּ <WH413> to us בְּשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> unto us in the name יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵינֶ֥נּוּ <WH369> will not שֹׁמְעִ֖ים <WH8085> we will not hearken אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> about

כִּ֩י <WH3588> for עָשֹׂ֨ה <WH6213> But we will certainly נַעֲשֶׂ֜ה <WH6213> do אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> every הַדָּבָ֣ר ׀ <WH1697> whatsoever thing אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that יָצָ֣א <WH3318> goeth forth מִפִּ֗ינוּ <WH6310> out of our own mouth לְקַטֵּ֞ר <WH6999> to burn incense לִמְלֶ֣כֶת <WH4446> unto the queen הַשָּׁמַיִם֮ <WH8064> of heaven וְהַסֵּֽיךְ־ <WH5258> and to pour out לָ֣הּ נְסָכִים֒ <WH5262> drink offerings כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after עָשִׂ֜ינוּ <WH6213> unto her as we have done אֲנַ֤חְנוּ <WH587> ourselves וַאֲבֹתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH1> we and our fathers מְלָכֵ֣ינוּ <WH4428> our kings וְשָׂרֵ֔ינוּ <WH8269> and our princes בְּעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> in the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וּבְחֻצ֖וֹת <WH2351> and in the streets יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וַנִּֽשְׂבַּֽע־ <WH7646> for [then] had we plenty לֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH3899> of victuals וַנִּֽהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become טוֹבִ֔ים <WH2896> and were well וְרָעָ֖ה <WH7451> no evil לֹ֥א <WH3808> no רָאִֽינוּ׃ <WH7200> and saw

וּמִן־ <WH4480> at אָ֡ז <WH227> for חָדַ֜לְנוּ <WH2308> But since we left off לְקַטֵּ֨ר <WH6999> to burn incense לִמְלֶ֧כֶת <WH4446> to the queen הַשָּׁמַ֛יִם <WH8064> of heaven וְהַסֵּֽךְ־ <WH5258> and to pour out לָ֥הּ נְסָכִ֖ים <WH5262> drink offerings חָסַ֣רְנוּ <WH2637> unto her we have wanted כֹ֑ל <WH3605> everything וּבַחֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> by the sword וּבָרָעָ֖ב <WH7458> and by the famine תָּֽמְנוּ׃ <WH8552> all [things] and have been consumed

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> when אֲנַ֤חְנוּ <WH587> we מְקַטְּרִים֙ <WH6999> And when we burned incense לִמְלֶ֣כֶת <WH4446> to the queen הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of heaven וּלְהַסֵּ֥ךְ <WH5258> and poured out לָ֖הּ נְסָכִ֑ים <WH5262> drink offerings הֲמִֽבַּלְעֲדֵ֣י <WH1107> unto her without אֲנָשֵׁ֗ינוּ <WH582> we עָשִׂ֨ינוּ <WH6213> unto her did we make לָ֤הּ כַּוָּנִים֙ <WH3561> her cakes לְהַ֣עֲצִבָ֔ה <WH6087> to worship וְהַסֵּ֥ךְ <WH5258> her and pour out לָ֖הּ נְסָכִֽים׃ <WH5262> drink offerings פ

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> Then Jeremiah אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> unto all the people עַל־ <WH5921> unto הַגְּבָרִ֤ים <WH1397> to the men וְעַל־ <WH5921> and הַנָּשִׁים֙ <WH802> and to the women וְעַל־ <WH5921> unto כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> and to all the people הָעֹנִ֥ים <WH6030> were giving אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> דָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> him an answer לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

הֲל֣וֹא <WH3808> not אֶת־ <WH853> הַקִּטֵּ֗ר <WH6999> that ye burned אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> for קִטַּרְתֶּ֜ם <WH7002> The incense בְּעָרֵ֤י <WH5892> in the cities יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah וּבְחֻצ֣וֹת <WH2351> and in the streets יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem אַתֶּ֧ם <WH859> you וַאֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֛ם <WH1> ye and your fathers מַלְכֵיכֶ֥ם <WH4428> your kings וְשָׂרֵיכֶ֖ם <WH8269> and your princes וְעַ֣ם <WH5971> and the people הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the land אֹתָם֙ <WH853> זָכַ֣ר <WH2142> remember יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> did not the LORD וַֽתַּעֲלֶ֖ה <WH5927> them and came עַל־ <WH5921> and לִבּֽוֹ׃ <WH3820> care for

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> was no יוּכַל֩ <WH3201> could יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> So that the LORD ע֜וֹד <WH5750> longer לָשֵׂ֗את <WH5375> no longer bear מִפְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> because רֹ֣עַ <WH7455> of the evil מַעַלְלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH4611> of your doings מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> [and] because הַתּוֹעֵבֹ֖ת <WH8441> of the abominations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עֲשִׂיתֶ֑ם <WH6213> which ye have committed וַתְּהִ֣י <WH1961> has become אַ֠רְצְכֶם <WH776> therefore is your land לְחָרְבָּ֨ה <WH2723> a desolation וּלְשַׁמָּ֧ה <WH8047> and an astonishment וְלִקְלָלָ֛ה <WH7045> and a curse מֵאֵ֥ין <WH369> without יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> without an inhabitant כְּהַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> as at this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

מִפְּנֵי֩ <WH6440> accept אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> you קִטַּרְתֶּ֜ם <WH6999> ye have burned incense וַאֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> and חֲטָאתֶ֣ם <WH2398> and because ye have sinned לַיהוָ֗ה <WH3069> God וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> and not שְׁמַעְתֶּם֙ <WH8085> and have not obeyed בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> the voice יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God וּבְתֹרָת֧וֹ <WH8451> in his law וּבְחֻקֹּתָ֛יו <WH2708> nor in his statutes וּבְעֵדְוֹתָ֖יו <WH5715> nor in his testimonies לֹ֣א <WH3808> or הֲלַכְתֶּ֑ם <WH1980> nor walked עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֞ן <WH3651> after that קָרָ֥את <WH7122> is happened אֶתְכֶ֛ם <WH853> הָרָעָ֥ה <WH7451> therefore this evil הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> likewise כַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> unto you as at this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יִרְמְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH3414> Moreover Jeremiah אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> unto all the people וְאֶ֖ל <WH413> about כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַנָּשִׁ֑ים <WH802> and to all the women שִׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> Hear דְּבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְהוּדָ֕ה <WH3063> all Judah אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> that [are] in the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt ס

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָֽה־ <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֩ <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֨י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying אַתֶּ֨ם <WH859> you וּנְשֵׁיכֶ֜ם <WH802> Ye and your wives וַתְּדַבֵּ֣רְנָה <WH1696> have both spoken בְּפִיכֶם֮ <WH6310> with your mouths וּבִידֵיכֶ֣ם <WH3027> with your hand מִלֵּאתֶ֣ם ׀ <WH4390> and fulfilled לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> saying עָשֹׂ֨ה <WH6213> We will surely נַעֲשֶׂ֜ה <WH6213> perform אֶת־ <WH853> נְדָרֵ֗ינוּ <WH5088> our vows אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> we נָדַ֙רְנוּ֙ <WH5087> that we have vowed לְקַטֵּר֙ <WH6999> to burn incense לִמְלֶ֣כֶת <WH4446> to the queen הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of heaven וּלְהַסֵּ֥ךְ <WH5258> and to pour out לָ֖הּ נְסָכִ֑ים <WH5262> drink offerings הָקֵ֤ים <WH6965> unto her ye will surely תָּקִ֙ימְנָה֙ <WH6965> accomplish אֶת־ <WH853> נִדְרֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5088> your vows וְעָשֹׂ֥ה <WH6213> and surely תַעֲשֶׂ֖ינָה <WH6213> perform אֶת־ <WH853> נִדְרֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5088> your vows פ

לָכֵן֙ <WH3651> Nevertheless שִׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> Therefore hear דְבַר־ <WH1697> ye the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְהוּדָ֕ה <WH3063> all Judah הַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <WH3427> that dwell בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold נִשְׁבַּ֜עְתִּי <WH7650> Behold I have sworn בִּשְׁמִ֤י <WH8034> name הַגָּדוֹל֙ <WH1419> by my great אָמַ֣ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD אִם־ <WH518> never יִהְיֶה֩ <WH1961> become ע֨וֹד <WH5750> again שְׁמִ֜י <WH8034> that my name נִקְרָ֣א ׀ <WH7121> shall no more be named בְּפִ֣י ׀ <WH6310> in the mouth כָּל־ <WH3605> of any אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> of any man יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah אֹמֵ֛ר <WH559> saying חַי־ <WH2416> liveth אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> The Lord יְהוִ֖ה <WH3069> GOD בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in all the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold שֹׁקֵ֧ד <WH8245> Behold I will watch עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> over לְרָעָ֖ה <WH7451> over them for evil וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> for לְטוֹבָ֑ה <WH2896> and not for good וְתַמּוּ֩ <WH8552> shall be consumed כָל־ <WH3605> and all אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> and all the men יְהוּדָ֜ה <WH3063> of Judah אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> who בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> that [are] in the land מִצְרַ֛יִם <WH4714> of Egypt בַּחֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> by the sword וּבָרָעָ֖ב <WH7458> and by the famine עַד־ <WH5704> until כְּלוֹתָֽם׃ <WH3615> until there be an end

וּפְלִיטֵ֨י <WH6412> that escape חֶ֜רֶב <WH2719> the sword יְשֻׁב֨וּן <WH7725> shall return out מִן־ <WH4480> Mine אֶ֧רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִצְרַ֛יִם <WH4714> of Egypt אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> into the land יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah מְתֵ֣י <WH4962> Yet a small מִסְפָּ֑ר <WH4557> number וְֽיָדְע֞וּ <WH3045> there shall know כָּל־ <WH3605> all שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> and all the remnant יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah הַבָּאִ֤ים <WH935> that are gone לְאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> into the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> of Egypt לָג֣וּר <WH1481> to sojourn שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> there דְּבַר־ <WH1697> whose words מִ֥י <WH4310> whose יָק֖וּם <WH6965> shall stand מִמֶּ֥נִּי <WH4480> Mine וּמֵהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> like

וְזֹאת־ <WH2063> likewise לָכֶ֤ם הָאוֹת֙ <WH226> And this [shall be] a sign נְאֻם־ <WH5002> unto you saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> I am going פֹקֵ֥ד <WH6485> that I will punish אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5921> against בַּמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> you in this place הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> This לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> so תֵּֽדְע֔וּ <WH3045> that ye may know כִּי֩ <WH3588> for ק֨וֹם <WH6965> shall surely יָק֧וּמוּ <WH6965> stand דְבָרַ֛י <WH1697> that my words עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5921> against לְרָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> against you for evil ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> I am going נֹ֠תֵן <WH5414> Behold I will give אֶת־ <WH853> פַּרְעֹ֨ה חָפְרַ֤ע <WH6548> Pharaohhophra מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> of Egypt בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> into the hand אֹֽיְבָ֔יו <WH341> of his enemies וּבְיַ֖ד <WH3027> and into the hand מְבַקְשֵׁ֣י <WH1245> of them that seek נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <WH5315> his life כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> I נָתַ֜תִּי <WH5414> as I gave אֶת־ <WH853> צִדְקִיָּ֣הוּ <WH6667> Zedekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah בְּיַ֨ד <WH3027> into the hand נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֧ר <WH5019> of Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֛ל <WH894> of Babylon אֹיְב֖וֹ <WH341> his enemy וּמְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <WH1245> and that sought נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH5315> his life ס
